room_title: Escape room "Peter Pan The Escape Room Adventure" by Mystery Escape Room in Salt Lake City
review: I was able to go with a group of friends. We had SO much fun! We did the Peter Pan escape room. It was a blast. We were able to escape and save Tinkerbell. Our guide was Captain Sparky and he did a great job. The room looked awesome. There were lots of cool elements. We had a great time. It was a good puzzle without being too hard. Thanks so much!

room_title: Escape room "Peter Pan The Escape Room Adventure" by Mystery Escape Room in Salt Lake City
review: Super fun!! Our guide, Tennessee, was super funny and helpful. Definitely would recommend the Peter Pan room - it was harder than it sounds!!

room_title: Escape room "Peter Pan The Escape Room Adventure" by Mystery Escape Room in Salt Lake City
review: Had a great time in the Peter Pan room. Family of 4 with Nearly (Melissa) as a guide. Story was cute, our guide was fun and interactive, room was well-made. First escape room for my son and my parents- everyone was able to work on the puzzles and get into the game!
